doc.name: CatchExceptionAttribute
doc.description: This attribute catches exceptions and attempts to handle them with the specified policy. If the exception cannot be handled, the attribute indicates this to the Manager. Status messages may be logged to a file.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee, Elizabeth Latronico
doc.property: The exception message from the caught exception.
The file, if any, to log messages to.

The error handling policy to apply if an exception occurs.
One of: Continue, Throw, Restart, Quit
The latest action, if any, taken by the CatchExceptionAttribute. For example, a notification that the model has restarted. It offers a way to provide feedback to the user.
